location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Captain William Hill, Captain of HMS Toweyand Senior Officer in the Persian Gulf to William Bruce, Honourable Company's Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a memorandum to be forwarded to everyone who served under him in the Gulf.The memorandum relates to Hill's command in the Gulf being over and commends the service of those who served under him.
